value.title: Explore concepts of non-relational data
value.excerpt: Explore concepts of non-relational data

value.title: Explore data ingestion in Azure
value.excerpt: Explore data ingestion in Azure

value.title: Introduction to Python
value.excerpt: Learn about the Python programming language, how to execute statements and scripts, declare variables, and create a basic Python app.

value.title: Predict categories with machine learning classification
value.excerpt: Use machine learning models to categorize data. Build a logistic regression model and support vector machine models to predict categories like win/loss and tree species.

images.title: Predict categories with machine learning classification

value.title: Introduction to machine learning
value.excerpt: A high-level overview of machine learning for people with little or no knowledge of computer science and statistics. You’ll be introduced to some essential concepts, explore data, and interactively go through the machine learning life-cycle - using Python to train, save, and use a machine learning model like we would in the real world.

value.title: Predict numeric values with regression
value.excerpt: Use machine learning regression models to predict numeric values. Build multiple variations of linear regression models to estimate things like internet traffic.

value.title: Manage Agile software delivery plans across teams
value.excerpt: Learn to optimize delivery efficiency by improving work plan visibility across teams.

value.title: Use Azure Resource Manager
value.excerpt: You will learn to use resource groups to organization your organization’s Azure resources.

value.title: Ingest, prepare & transform using Azure Databricks & Data Factory | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Today's business managers depend heavily on reliable data integration systems that run complex ETL/ELT workflows (extract, transform/load and load/transform data). Gaurav Malhotra joins Scott Hanselman to discuss how you can iteratively build, debug, deploy, and monitor your data integration workflows
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/CZQOxPY7UuA" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Build and run a web application with the MEAN stack on an Azure Linux virtual machine
value.excerpt: Learn how to decide if the MEAN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, AngularJS, and Node.js) is a good choice for you and set up a MEAN-based web application on a new Azure Linux virtual machine.

value.title: Configure resources with Azure Resource Manager templates
value.excerpt: Configure resources with Azure Resource Manager templates

value.title: Configure user and group accounts
value.excerpt: You will learn how to configure user and group accounts.

value.title: Create a Linux virtual machine in Azure
value.excerpt: This module guides you through options for virtual machines in Azure, creating and connecting a Linux virtual machine, and configuring your network settings.

value.title: Design your migration to Azure
value.excerpt: Minimize the time and resources required to migrate your on-premises environment to Azure. Assess your current systems with Azure Migrate, and migrate them with Azure Migrate and Azure Database Migration Service.

value.title: Understand the evolving world of data
value.excerpt: Discover how data systems and roles are evolving and explore the differences between on-premises and cloud data solutions using sample business cases.

value.title: Host a web application with Azure App service
value.excerpt: Create a website in the programming language of your choice through the hosted web app platform in Azure App Service.

value.title: How to create an Azure SQL database | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, you will learn how to create an Azure SQL Database in the Azure Portal and how you can be more productive in Azure.    Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com   Keep connected on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AzurePortal
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/p7X8lH_XMtI" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: What is Azure role-based access control (RBAC)? | One Dev Question: Arturo Lucatero
value.excerpt: In the One Dev Question series, Arturo Lucatero, a Senior Program Manager working on Azure role-based access control (RBAC), explains Azure role-based access control.    For more information, visit: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/role-based-access-control/overview  Try Azure for free: https://aka.ms/TryAzure5
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Dzhm-garKBM" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Configure network security groups
value.excerpt: You will learn how to implement network security groups and ensure network security group rules are correctly applied.

value.title: Configure role-based access control
value.excerpt: You will learn how to use role-based access control to ensure resources are protected, but users can still access the resources they need.

value.title: Create a classification model with Azure Machine Learning designer
value.excerpt: Classification is a supervised machine learning technique used to predict categories or classes. Learn how to create classification models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

value.title: Create serverless logic with Azure Functions
value.excerpt: Azure Functions allow you to host business logic that can be executed without managing or provisioning server infrastructure

value.title: Secure and isolate access to Azure resources by using network security groups and service endpoints
value.excerpt: Find out how Azure network security groups and service endpoints help you secure your virtual machines and Azure services from unauthorized network access.

value.title: How to create a virtual machine in Azure | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: Azure provides multiple virtual machine configuration options for you to set up your virtual machine exactly how you want for whatever you're trying to do. In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, learn how to configure a basic virtual machine and connect to it in minutes in the Azure portal.
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/rOiSRkxtTeU" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: How to get started with Azure API Management | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to get started with Azure API Management, a service that helps protect and manage your APIs.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips     Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/gA2yxwKo0M0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Quantum programming with Q# and running on hardware with Azure Quantum | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Mariia Mykhailova joins Scott Hanselman to discuss quantum computing and quantum programming with Microsoft Quantum Development Kit (QDK), from writing Q# code to running it on hardware via Azure Quantum.  ⏩ 0:00 – Intro ⏩ 0:51 – Overview ⏩ 5:43 – From algorithm to coding and unit tests ⏩ 20:58 – Jupyter
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/c9Df90CVHkc" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore relational data in Azure
value.excerpt: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore relational data in Azure

topItems.title: Explore relational data offerings in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore relational data offerings in Azure

topItems.title: Explore provisioning and deploying relational database offerings in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore provisioning and deploying relational database offerings in Azure

value.title: Azure for the Data Engineer
value.excerpt: This learning path guides data engineers through the evolving benefits your organization gains with Azure cloud data platform technologies.

topItems.title: Understand the evolving world of data
topItems.excerpt: Discover how data systems and roles are evolving and explore the differences between on-premises and cloud data solutions using sample business cases.

topItems.title: Survey the services on the Azure Data platform
topItems.excerpt: Explore the broad array of Azure technologies that analyze text or images and relational, nonrelational, or streaming data.

topItems.title: Identify the tasks of a data engineer in a cloud-hosted architecture
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the responsibilities of a data engineer, how they relate to the jobs of other data and AI roles, and explore common data engineering practices.

value.title: Automate Azure tasks using scripts with PowerShell
value.excerpt: Learn how to install Azure PowerShell on Linux, macOS, or Windows and then connect to Azure and manage your resources.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Security
value.excerpt: Discover the tools that Azure provides to help you design a secure environment throughout your infrastructure, data, network, and applications.
